mapper.select: SELECT ID,CYCLE_YEAR title,PARENT_ID pid,0 isend, 0 is_year, 1 is_month FROM IOP.DEV_PRODUCE_CYCLE WHERE PARENT_ID = '1' AND IS_DEL = '0' ORDER BY CYCLE_YEAR DESC

SELECT ID,CYCLE_MONTH title,PARENT_ID pid,0 is_end,0 is_year,0 is_month FROM IOP.DEV_PRODUCE_CYCLE WHERE PARENT_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM IOP.DEV_PRODUCE_CYCLE WHERE PARENT_ID = '1' AND IS_DEL = '0') AND IS_DEL = '0'

SELECT * FROM IOP.DEV_PRODUCE_CYCLE WHERE PARENT_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM IOP.DEV_PRODUCE_CYCLE WHERE PARENT_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM IOP.DEV_PRODUCE_CYCLE WHERE PARENT_ID = '1' AND IS_DEL = '0') AND IS_DEL = '0') AND IS_DEL = '0'
